bullets.title: GOVERNMENT
bullets.description: Governments leverage GATACA Certify for the issuance of digital credentials such as verifiable IDs, driver's licenses, passports, birth certificates, business licenses and so much more, and use Connect for government grade secure authentication of citizens into eGovernment services. Citizens use their Wallet to receive and share these digital credentials with third parties for instant authentication and identity verification.

bullets.title: EDUCATION
bullets.description: Forward-thinking institutions have realized how SSI technology can take their innovation to the next level. Universities are pioneering SSI use cases such as the issuance of digital student IDs, academic diplomas, microcredentials, and transcripts. Students use these credentials stored in their digital wallet to access online portals, buildings or labs, apply to further education, enroll in exchange programs and much more without the use paper-based documents.

firstSection.title: Our techonlogy is aplicable to all sectors

bullets.title: Banking
bullets.subtitle: Seamless & secure online banking
bullets.description: Identity fraud risk and KYC regulation in the banking sector result in complex and long user onboarding processes, while conversion rates drop. Our government-grade secure, privacy protecting SSI technology not only improves client experiences but also enables instant and efficient identity verification.

bullets.title: Crypto / Defi
bullets.subtitle: Attract new clients with a layer of trust
bullets.description: Decentralized digital identities may trigger mass adoption for the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) and cryptocurrency space by providing a layer of trust between users, providers, and regulators in the form of eKYC for crypto/ICOs and instant, compliant, and secure onboarding into crypto/DeFi platforms.

bullets.title: Healthcare
bullets.subtitle: Patient data interaction, reimagined
bullets.description: For Healthcare providers, our technology offers a more efficient and secure access & management of patient data. With our products, healthcare providers can issue digital health credentials that patients store in a digital Wallet, where they control who these are shared with. Credential types range from Covid health passes, vaccination records, insurance cards, or any other type of medical record.

bullets.title: Travel
bullets.subtitle: Transform traveler experiences
bullets.description: In addition to Covid health passes, the integration of SSI technology in the travel industry has the potential to enhance traveler experience and boost the sector recovery. Digital identities provide benefits such as automatic airport security, fast airline check-in, and instant hotel check-in thanks to the issuance of globally recognized digital passports, boarding passes and travel visas.

bullets.title: Real Estate
bullets.subtitle: Optimize transactions
bullets.description: In the real estate sector, secure identity verification is essential, however current methods demand too many resources and rely on antiquated methods. SSI technology allows users to instantly and securely verify their identites in seconds which optimizes and secures online or P2P buy/sell and renting situations, and makes building access more efficient.

bullets.title: Corporation
bullets.subtitle: Better for your clients, partners and employees
bullets.description: Businesses can now issue digital employee cards to employees or authorized partner certifications to suppliers, who in turn use these to enjoy frictionless access into company systems and/or buildings. Businesses can also leverage our technology to issue credentials to their clients such as membership & loyalty cards and provide a unique, stress-free customer journey.
